text: Aldo Pedrana (born 11 April 1934) is an Italian skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1956 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Italy Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy
title: Aldo Pedrana
